elements.title: a Hungarian nobleman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Hungarian nobleman (pictured) survived with a spear in his head?

elements.title: Friday the 13th (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Friday the 13th has been credited for popularizing the trope of teenage characters suffering violent murders after having premarital sex?

elements.title: Tish Weinstock (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Tish Weinstock got married over the Halloween weekend in 2022 at a castle wearing a wedding dress made from antique lace styled after Morticia Addams?

elements.title: Ingersoll's Ordinary (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ingersoll's Ordinary was used as a prison during the Salem witch trials?

elements.title: Villains Are Destined to Die (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the art of Villains Are Destined to Die was said to be "almost in-between the Disney happy-ending fairy tales and the original Grimm's stories"?

elements.title: Eva Coo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that police forced Eva Coo and her accomplice to reenact a killing at the crime scene using the victim's exhumed body?

elements.title: CarnEvil (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one of the bosses of the video game CarnEvil can be replaced with a giant teddy bear?

elements.title: Freddius (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the flatworm Freddius is named after Freddy Krueger's razor gloves?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Parahyangan

The West Javanese region centred around Java's third largest city of Bandung is an excellent place to hike and admire active volcanoes.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Sekigahara

This quaint mountain town and battlefield, where Tokugawa won control of Japan, gives visitors firsthand insight into feudal Japanese warfare.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Driving in China

China isn't one of the countries that foreigners commonly explore by driving themselves. If you'd still like to, the first step would be getting a local driving licence.
